channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Binance files for crucial EU-wide license, creates Greek holding company
item.description: The crypto firm has filed for a MiCA license with Greek regulators ahead of a critical summer deadline.

item.title: Panera Just Overhauled Its Rewards Program in a Big Way to Win Back Fans
item.description: The popular restaurant chain is betting that expanded rewards options will drive more frequent visits.

item.title: AI drug startup Insilico Medicine launches an AI ‘gym’ to help models like GPT and Qwen be good at science
item.description: With the “gym,” Insilico is now targeting other biotech and pharmaceutical companies, offering to train new AI models for them.

item.title: Cancer Deaths in Young People Are Falling, Except for One Type

item.title: Jamie Dimon tackles Trump on immigration: ‘I don’t like what I’m seeing … I think we should calm down a little bit on the internal anger’
item.description: The JPMorgan Chase CEO even said Trump strikes a different tone in private, agreeing "merit-based" immigration is a good thing.
